name: WiseParrot
0:
”Alexa ask wise parrot about Italian cuisine.”
”Alexa ask wise parrot who was Albert Einstein.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: wise parrot
des:
Explore multiple topics from Wikipedia. Move to a different topic at any time and start from where you left from a previously explored topic. Here is a sample interaction

> Alexa, ask wise parrot about Italian Cuisine
"Italian cuisine is food typical from Italy. It has developed through centuries of social and economic changes with roots stretching in antiquity. Significant changes occurred with the discovery of the New World with the introduction of potatoes, tomatoes and beets. Italian cuisine is known for its regional ... "
> Alexa, tell me about Italy
"Italy, officially the Italian Republic is a sovereign state in Europe. Located in the heart of the Mediterranean Sea ..."
> Alexa, go back to Italian Cuisine
"Significant changes occurred with the discovery of the New World with the introduction of potatoes ..."
